name: Mutual Information Analysis
description: Measures inter-channel information redundancy to detect abnormal color channel dependencies in AI-generated images.
algorithm: Shannon Mutual Information Estimation (R-G, R-B, G-B)
mechanism: Estimates mutual information between color channel pairs using joint histogram. AI images may exhibit atypical inter-channel dependencies.
parameters: Channel pairs: R-G, R-B, G-B, Histogram bins: 256, Method: joint histogram MI estimation
source: Cover, T.M. & Thomas, J.A. (2006) — Elements of Information Theory, Wiley
useCase: Detecting abnormal color channel relationships in AI content

references.title: Cover, T.M. & Thomas, J.A. (2006). Elements of Information Theory. Wiley.
